title: Hextech Chests haven't reset?
body: When preseason comes around aren't you supposed to be able to get chests on all the champions again? Or is that the 8.1 patch or something like that?

replies.body: Those mastery chests reset when the new season starts! You still have some time to clean up any remaining chests you haven't gotten yet during preseason before they reset.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=bU4Ew8Kt,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-03T23:42:25.551+0000)
>
> Those mastery chests reset when the new season starts! You still have some time to clean up any remaining chests you haven't gotten yet during preseason before they reset.

Thanks! I wasn't aware they restarted at the new season and not at Preseason.
